br.title: Submachine Gun - Available Now!
br.body: New standard SMG with a fast rate of fire and reduced accuracy penalty while moving.

br.title: Save the World 50% OFF!
br.body: Push back the storm in this four-player co-op PVE campaign! Build forts, craft weapons, and level-up your Heroes.

br.title: Oversee Your Victory
br.body: The Omen Outfit and Oracle Axe Pickaxe are in the Item Shop now!

br.title: Season 5 Battle Pass
br.body: 100 tiers. Over 100 rewards. New toys, outfits, gliders, pickaxes, emotes, and more! Available now for 950 V-Bucks!
